reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports every 90 days, and a midterm report by 15 December 2015, and a report with recommendations by 31 March 2016
summary:
Authorizes the deployment of this unit to Liberia, with consent from troop-contributing countries and the Government of Liberia, in case of a serious security deterioration.

Requests the Secretary-General to inform the Council of any deployment and obtain authorization for deployments exceeding 90 days.

Calls for enhanced support from UN entities in Côte d’Ivoire and Liberia for border area stabilization.

Commends inter-mission cooperation between UNOCI and MINUSMA.

Requests the Secretary-General to:

- Keep the Council informed of the situation in Côte d’Ivoire.
- Provide a midterm report by 15 December 2015.
- Provide a report by 31 March 2016 with recommendations on possible termination.

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
